title: Create a blog post title picture
description: Tutorial about how to blur a photo and add text in PowerPoint in order to create a picture with the blog title post.
content: Create a Blog Post Title PictureA cool way to make your blog title stand out, is to blur a picture and add the text of your blog title in bold letters, as in the example below.<img src="/assets/images/blogimages/figs-09-23/ss-blog2.png"...

title: Sample Post
description: A sample post to show how the content will look and how will different headlines, quotes and codes will be represented.
content: This post will show you how the content will look like in the post pages and how the headlines, quotes and quotes will be represented.
